00047                 PoolSet<PagingLandScapeRenderable>(),
00048                 mRenderableManager(0)
00049         {
00050         }

00054                 return new PagingLandScapeRenderable(mRenderableManager);
00055         }
00056         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00059                 delete r;

00061     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::PagingLandScapeRenderableManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr):
00063         mSceneManager(scnMgr),
00064         mOptions(scnMgr->getOptions ()), 
00065                 mRenderableLoadInterval (0),
00066                 mLoadInterval(0),
00067         mNumRenderableLoading(0)
00068     {
00069                 // auto extend ourself as we rather check 
00070                 //if we can found non Freed Renderables before
00071                 mRenderablePool.setAutoextend (false);
00072                 // don't Double renderables num each time... too much.
00073                 mRenderablePool.setExtendFactor (1.2f);
00074     }
00075     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::~PagingLandScapeRenderableManager()
00077     {
00078                 mRenderablePool.deletePool ();
00079     }
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::clear()
00082     {
00083         if (!mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.empty ())
00084         {
00085             PagingLandScapeTile *t = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.pop();
00086             while (t)
00087             {
00088                 t->uninit ();
00089                 t = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.pop ();
00090             }
00091             assert (mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.empty ());
00092         }
00093         // As Renderables change too much over maps (+- lit, normals, etc...)
00094         mRenderablePool.deletePool ();
00095     }
00096     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::load()
00098         {        
00099                 mRenderablePool.setRenderableManager (this);
00100 
00101         PagingLandScapeOptions *opt = mOptions;  
00102 
00103         mNumRenderableLoading = opt->num_renderables_loading;
00104         mNumRenderablesIncrement = opt->num_renderables_increment;
00105         mRenderableLoadInterval = opt->RenderableLoadInterval;
00106         mRenderablePool.setPoolSize (opt->num_renderables);
00107                 mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.clear();
00108     }
00109     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110     PagingLandScapeRenderable *PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::getRenderable()
00111     {
00112                 PagingLandScapeRenderable *r = mRenderablePool.getPoolable ();
00113             if (r == 0)
00114                 {
00115             // unload some Tiles/renderables no more used to free some space.
00116             processTileUnload ();
00117 
00118                         r = mRenderablePool.getPoolable ();
00119                         if (r == 0)
00120                         {
00121                                 mRenderablePool.autoExtend();
00122                                 r = mRenderablePool.getPoolable();
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125                 return r;
00126     }
00127     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00128     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::freeRenderable(PagingLandScapeRenderable *rend)
00129     {
00130                 assert (rend->mParentTile == 0);
00131                 mRenderablePool.removePoolable(rend);
00132     }
00133     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00134     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::queueRenderableLoading(PagingLandScapeTile *tile)
00135         {
00136                 assert (tile);  
00137 
00138                 assert (!tile->isLoading());
00139                 assert (tile->getRenderable ()); 
00140                 assert (!tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued);
00141 
00142                 assert (tile->isLoaded ()); 
00143         assert (!tile->getRenderable ()->isLoaded ());   
00144                 assert (tile->getRenderable ()->isInUse ());
00145 
00146                 //
00147                 tile->setLoading(true);
00148         tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued = true;
00149 
00150                 //
00151         mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.push (tile);
00152 
00153     }
00154     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00155     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::unqueueRenderable (PagingLandScapeTile *tile)
00156         {
00157                 assert (tile->isLoading());
00158                 assert (tile->getRenderable ());
00159                 assert (tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued);
00160 
00161                 assert (tile->isLoaded ());
00162                 assert (!tile->getRenderable ()->isLoaded ());
00163                 //assert (!tile->getRenderable ()->isInUse ());
00164 
00165                 //
00166                 tile->setLoading (false);
00167                 tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued = false;
00168 
00169                 //
00170         mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.remove (tile);
00171         }
00172         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00173         void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::processTileUnload()
00174         {
00175                 if (mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.empty())
00176                         return;
00177 
00178                 PagingLandScapeTile *tile;
00179                 for (PagingLandScapeQueue<PagingLandScapeTile>::MsgQueType::iterator itq = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.begin(); 
00180                         itq != mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.end();)
00181                 {
00182                         tile = *itq;
00183                         assert (tile != 0);
00184 
00185                         assert (tile->isLoading());
00186                         assert (tile->getRenderable ());
00187                         assert (tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued);
00188 
00189                         assert (tile->isLoaded ());       
00190                         assert (tile->getSceneNode());
00191                         assert (!tile->getRenderable ()->isLoaded ()); 
00192 
00193                         if (!tile->getRenderable ()->isInUse ())
00194             {
00195                                 tile->setLoading (false);
00196                                 tile->getRenderable ()->mQueued = false;
00197                 tile->unload (); 
00198                                 itq = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.erase (itq);
00199                         }
00200                         else
00201                         {
00202                                 ++itq;
00203                         }
00204                 }
00205         }
00206     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00207     bool PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::executeRenderableLoading(const Vector3 &Cameraposition)
00208     {
00209         if (mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.empty())
00210         {
00211             return true;        
00212         }
00213         else
00214         { 
00215                         if (mLoadInterval-- < 0)
00216                         {
00217                                 const size_t queueSize = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.getSize () ;
00218                                 mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.sortNearest(Cameraposition);
00219                 const size_t k = mNumRenderableLoading > queueSize ? queueSize : mNumRenderableLoading;
00220                                 for (size_t i = 0; i < k; i++)
00221                                 {
00222                                         
00223                                         PagingLandScapeTile * const tile = mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.pop ();
00224                                         // no more in queues.
00225                                         assert (tile != 0);
00226                                         assert (tile->isLoaded ());
00227                                         assert (tile->isLoading());   
00228                                         PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rend = tile->getRenderable ();
00229 
00230                                         assert (rend != 0);
00231                                         assert (rend->mParentTile == tile);
00232                                         assert (rend->mQueued);  
00233                                         assert (!rend->isLoaded ());      
00234                                         SceneNode * const tileSceneNode = tile->getSceneNode ();
00235                                         assert (tileSceneNode != 0);
00236 
00237 
00238                                         // if renderable can be loaded 
00239                                         if (rend->load ())
00240                                         {
00241                                                 tileSceneNode->attachObject (rend);
00242                                                 tile->_linkRenderableNeighbor ();
00243                                         }
00244                                         else
00245                                         {       
00246                                                 // (no data yet.) empty tile.
00247                                                 tile->unload ();
00248                                         }
00249 
00250                                         tile->setLoading(false);
00251                                         rend->mQueued = false;
00252 
00253                                         tileSceneNode->needUpdate ();
00254                                 }
00255                                 mLoadInterval = mRenderableLoadInterval;
00256                         }
00257         }
00258         return false;
00259     }

00264             return static_cast< unsigned int > (mRenderablePool.getPoolSize());
00265     }

00267     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00268     size_t PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::numFree(void) const
00269     {
00270             return mRenderablePool.getPoolSize() - mRenderablePool.getActivePoolablesSize ();
00271     }

00273     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00274     size_t PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::numLoading(void) const
00275     {
00276             return mTilesLoadRenderableQueue.getSize();
00277     }
00278     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00279     void PagingLandScapeRenderableManager::_addBatch(const unsigned int num)
00280     {
00281                 mRenderablePool.setPoolSize (mRenderablePool.getPoolSize() + num);
00282         #ifdef _DEBUG
00283             std::cout << "Renderables addBatch : " << mRenderablePool.getPoolSize() << "\n";
00284         #endif _DEBUG
00285     }
